name: BaseAudioContext.createConstantSource
description: The createConstantSource() property of the BaseAudioContext interface creates a ConstantSourceNode object, which is an audio source that continuously outputs a monaural (one-channel) sound signal whose samples all have the same value.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'createConstantSource()' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
